mapper.sql: id, arrive_time, code, content, result, accept_time, remark
mapper.insert: insert into esk_list (id, arrive_time, code, content, result, accept_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into esk_list
id,
arrive_time,

content,
result,
accept_time,
remark,

mapper.update:
update esk_list
arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update esk_list set arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from esk_list ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start},#{offset};

select
from esk_list
1=1
AND content like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
AND code like CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND result like CONCAT('%',#{result},'%')
ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start},#{offset}
